content: **additional materials** * 5mm or other plastic eyes * embroidery floss or yarn for face this pattern was originally released as part of a larger set tiny ami 2 it was later released for free **tiny ami 2 set** - mushroom http //www ravelry com/patterns/show/mushroom - cafe con leche mug http //www ravelry com/patterns/show/cafe-con-leche-mug - cupcake http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cupcake-4 - fried egg http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fried-egg - donut - ice cream cone - cookie http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cookie-2
